revised_title: A New Type of Orbitolites: Orbitolites Tenuissima and Its Implications on Foraminifera Classification
tldr: The author discovers a new type of Orbitolites, Orbitolites tenuissima, which exhibits a complete transition between the Milioline and Orbitoline plans of growth, providing evidence for the close relationship between these two types and challenging existing classification systems.
